amendment.description: To prohibit the payment by the Federal Crop Insurance Corporation of any portion of the premium for a policy or plan of insurance for tobacco.

vote.text: Amendment SA 923, under the order of 5/23/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 52. Record Vote Number: 137.

action.text: Amendment SA 923 proposed by Senator Feinstein.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 923, under the order of 5/23/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 52. Record Vote Number: 137.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 923, under the order of 5/23/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 52. Record Vote Number: 137.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 923 proposed by Senator Feinstein.
